price: Òun ni Allāhu, Ẹlẹ́dàá, Olùpilẹ̀-ẹ̀dá, Olùyàwòrán-ẹ̀dá. TiRẹ̀ ni àwọn orúkọ tó dára jùlọ. Ohunkóhun tó wà nínú àwọn sánmọ̀ àti ilẹ̀ ń ṣàfọ̀mọ́ fún Un. Òun sì ni Alágbára, Ọlọ́gbọ́n.
arabic: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخَٰلِقُ ٱلۡبَارِئُ ٱلۡمُصَوِّرُۖ لَهُ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۚ يُسَبِّحُ لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: huwa al-lahu al-khāliqu al-bāri-u al-muṣawiru lahu al-asmāu al-ḥus'nā yusabbiḥu lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
